# Changelog

## 0.5.0

### Minor Changes

- 27d0d63: Added new color, space and size tokens and adjusted some token values
- 6c4c62f: Update style for Toast component
- 6c4c62f: Update Toast style â€” adjusted padding and radius
- f707a84: Update spacing and sizing for Button, IconButton, ButtonAsLink
- 8d047cd: Reduced the size of the "Show/Hide" icon in the TextField component.

## 0.4.0

### Minor Changes

- 28487d0: Replace Interface icons with new icons set
- f3b94e7: Remove unused icons
- 108f777: Add SuperSans font to Superhuman theme
- 4cb5b8f: Improve HTML attribute forwarding and type safety across multiple components (Accordion, Badge, Box, ButtonAsLink, Checkbox, Combobox, Flex, Form, Icon, IconButton, Loader, Logo, Menu, PlanTag, Popover, PortalContainerProvider, Rating, Select, SkeletonLoader, Sticker, Switch, Tabs, Tag, TextField, Textarea, VerificationCode)
- 67130b0: Refactor all components to use semantic radius token with t-shirt size

## 0.3.0

### Minor Changes

- 6603e47: Update Superhuman elevation value and refactor Menu component elevation
- cc90b79: Replace ghost button with tertiary button in the ghost component

## 0.2.0

## 0.1.0

### Minor Changes

- 084ffc3: Change Combobox hover state token use
- 084ffc3: Added :focus-visible pseudo-class to Link and removed react-aria usage
- 9f6b5c5: Remove support completely for the `ColorSchemeProvider`

### Patch Changes

- 084ffc3: Change focus styling for Radio component
- 084ffc3: Update Button, IconButton focus styling and keyboard interaction in shadow DOM
- 084ffc3: Change focus styling for Switch component
- 084ffc3: Remove focus ring from button on mouse click

---

**Note:** This package was forked from Grammarly Design System.
For historical changelog prior to `@superhuman/origin@0.0.0`, see [GDS v6 changelog](https://designsystem.grammarly.io/6.x/whats-new)
